channel.title: How can I add these Staffords crowns
channel.description:
How can I add these pictures what the crown is using which staffilla whether the owner, admin, etc. here is what they would like these could you please help me how I could get these uploaded?
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/6jh66r.jpg[/img]Owner [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/oihk40.jpg[/img]CO-OWNER [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/x2w28w.gif[/img]HEAD ADMIN [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/sxfw3a.gif[/img]ADMIN [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/k4uu5f.gif[/img]HEAD MOD [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2rc4pj5.gif[/img]MOD
oops, sorry all frong section moderator can you delete that

item.title: How can I add these Staffords crowns
item.dc:creator: @jaredh jaredh
item.description:
@jaredh wrote:

find the crowns in your server/client folder that are already in use and add to the beggining of the crowns in use ‘‘old-’’. For example,

  1. admincrown.png old-admincrown.png

Add the crown you want in the same folder as the old ones and change there names to the previouse old crowns. For example,

  1. newadmincrown1.png admincrown.png

*note use the names of the previous crowns not the names above they were just examples.
*note make sure you change the end of the image type to the same as the old ones. For example,

newadmincrown1.jpg admincrown.png

Read full topic
item.source: How can I add these Staffords crowns
